title: Principles of Child Health and Communication Development
headline: Learn how to protect the health of children in this free online childcare course that covers the role of communication.
description: Did you know that childhood nutritional deficiencies can lead to severe disorders, physical impairments and major illnesses such as anaemia later in life? This childcare course teaches you the fundamentals of child health and development. We emphasise the importance of a nutritious diet, good sleep and effective communication in the development of a child's physical and psychological wellbeing. Sign up to pick up the best parenting techniques.
courseDescription:
All nutrients play an important role in the healthy development of a child's physical and psychological welfare. In this course, by Alpha Academy, you will study the principles of child care and development, both physically and psychologically. To begin, we will teach you all about the importance of proper nutrition for children.

This course explains the role played by a healthy diet in the healthy development of a baby. We also lay out the consequences of failing to provide the necessary nutrients to a developing child. We then discuss why hygiene and sleep play an important role in childhood development. We provide proven techniques for potty training your child while maintaining their hygiene to prepare you for the stresses of parenting.

Communication is an important aspect of a baby’s development. We go over various methods and strategies designed to develop a healthy communication style with your child. We show you how to understand how babies tend to communicate and exchange information with their parents. This course is suitable for expecting parents and anyone engaged in childcare like babysitters. Sign up to learn how to care for children and communicate with them as they develop.
